name: PuppetDanceMaster
description:
This is a rythmic based game called PuppetDanceMaster.

Play this game using 4, 5, 1 and 2 numberpad keys and make your puppet move when the moves spheres approach the blue box.

The biggest score possible is 260,807 I think. I would love to see you beat it if it's possible.

Everything in the game is owned by me, except the song, which is Earth Wind & Fire - September

Thanks for playing.
